product_name: Ergon Phorm S 310 Gel Max Bike Saddle - Women's
long_description: Whether you're out on a tour or just pedaling around town, the women's Phorm S 310 Gel Max women's bike saddle strikes a fine balance between comfort and performance. Perfect for all-around use, the resilient synthetic cover is soft to the touch and weather-resistant. Gel pads make you more comfortable by evenly distributing pressure and cushioning bumps in the road. Central channel helps take pressure off sensitive areas; splash guard under channel helps protect undercarriage from unwelcome road spray. In comparason to standard saddles, the overall narrower width enhances freedom of movement while a wider rear section enhances weight distribution and support.
short_description: Whether you're out on a tour or just pedaling around town, the women's Phorm S 310 Gel Max women's bike saddle strikes a fine balance between comfort and performance.
